partintro.para: There are various open source frameworks often used for implementation of web services including Apache CXF, Apache Axis/Axis2 and Spring Web Services. The cxf-jaxrs plugin is composed of sample codes to guide how to use JAX-RS (JSR-311) Frontend of Apache CXF among them and reference libraries needed to use the open source.
Install cxf-jaxrs plugin by entering the following command in the Command window.
Check the installation result using the installed (mvn anyframe:installed) or the jetty:run (mvn clean jetty:run) commands.
